SEARCH
程序包 org.bupt.persosnalfinance.Front.AlertFront

类 Spending

java.lang.Object
org.bupt.persosnalfinance.Front.AlertFront.Spending
public class Spending extends Object
Represents a spending entry for a specific category. Fields: - category: The name of the spending category. - lastQuarterAvg: The average spending for this category in the last quarter. - thisQuarter: The spending amount in the current quarter. - status: Indicates whether the spending is "Normal" or "Overspending" based on a given threshold. Methods: - updateStatus(double threshold): Updates the status field based on the percentage difference between last and current quarter.
